Body: I dropped my S3 in water and the stock battery stopped working. I didn't know how to fix it (I tried drying it with a hair dryer but it did not work) so after comparing prices and discounts I bought a new replacement battery from MPJ and have used it for a month already.It appears to work just as well as my stock battery. I don't know it's actual longevity but it works OK so far. Since I ordered from an official website, hopefully it's not a fake one...I still want to fix the stock battery though, can anyone help me?
Title: S3 battery not work after water damage

history.Text: because of my carelessness, my S III stock battery died caused by water damage last week. I don't know how to fix(i had dried it by a hair dryer but did not work ), so I need to buy a new [replacement battery][1], after comparing prices and discounts i finally picked up one from MPJ for my S3 and have used it a month already. It appears to work just as well as my stock battery. Idk its actual longevity but work good so far. Since i ordered from official website, hopely not a fake one...But i still want to fix the stock one, anyone help me?THX!  [1]: http://www.mpjbattery.com/battery-for-samsung/for-galaxy-s3-i9300.html
S3 battery not work after water damage

I dropped my S3 in water and the stock battery stopped working. I didn't know how to fix it (I tried drying it with a hair dryer but it did not work) so after comparing prices and discounts I bought a new [replacement battery][1] from MPJ and have used it for a month already.It appears to work just as well as my stock battery. I don't know it's actual longevity but it works OK so far. Since I ordered from an official website, hopefully it's not a fake one...I still want to fix the stock battery though, can anyone help me?  [1]: http://www.mpjbattery.com/battery-for-samsung/for-galaxy-s3-i9300.html
